summary: Vivida ENB - Performance SSAO and vivid colors
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/titolo.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][size=10][color=yellow]Please remember to endorse, it\'s just a click![/color][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]QzHQfAL_-kk[/youtube][/center]

[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/dryna900.jpg[/img][/center]

- Vivid colors
- Nights not too dark
- No high contrasts
- Fast and quality SSAO - SSIL
- Depth Of Field (eXXXtreme Edition)
- Less bloom effect
- Exterior lighting dramatically depends on weather
- Completely worked from scratch

eXXXtreme Edition cames with Matso\'s Bokeh DoF
[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/titoloExtreme.jpg[/img][/center]


* ABOUT PERFORMANCE *

Made on this system build:
- AMD X4 630 @2.8 GHz
- 4GB DDR2 800
- SAPPHIRE HD 6850 2GB
- Skyrim Settings: High Quality at 1440x900 (Monitor 19:10)

Standard Edition: I got 38-43fps at Riverwood, Solitude exterior - 50-60fps in interiors
eXXXtreme Edition: I got 32-36fps at Riverwood, Solitude exterior - 45-50fps in interiors

[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/v01.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/v02.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Screenshots by dryna[/center]

* INSTALLATION *

Download the ENB binaries from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_en.htm]this site[/url] and install files into your Skyrim folder (not data).
Download my ENB configuration and install files into your Skyrim folder too and overwrite existing files.

[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/v03.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://www.mannygt.com/skyrimmods/imgs/v04.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Screenshots by dryna[/center]

Enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *

Just delete every files from mine and ENB default.

* CREDITS *

Credits goes to:
Boris Vorontsov who made the ENB - www.enbdev.com
Matso for his Bokeh DoF effect
author: MannyGT

files.name: Vivida ENB 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
no more godrays
no more sunglare
new texture of the sun
tweaked enbseries.ini for a better sun
Now we have Lens Flare!

files.name: Vivida ENB 1_21 for v0_113
files.changelogHtml: Tweaked violet var in enbbloom.fx. The violet bloom effect is yellow now. The sun is \"hot\"!

files.name: Vivida ENB 1_4 eXXXtreme Edition for v0_114
files.changelogHtml:
Added the eXXXtreme Edition
- Matso\'s Bokeh DoF
- Compatible with ENB v0.114

files.name: Vivida ENB 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Support for the v0.114beta ENB release in date July 12th 2012
Better palette
Fixed skylight for this version
Added soft vignette effect
